conversation.content: Hi, I’d like to book a one-way flight from New York to London next month.

Hi and welcome to Celestar Air. I’m Nova, your virtual flight assistant. Thanks for calling! How can I help you today? I can help with a new booking. Are you a Stratos Rewards member, or should we proceed as a guest?
I think I have a Stratos account, but I’m not sure of the number.
No worries. I can look you up—what’s your phone number with country code, or your loyalty number if you have it?
Thanks. I’ve pulled up your profile—Alex Rivera, Gold tier. For your trip planning, is this a one-way, and which cabin would you like: Economy, Premium Economy, or Aether Business?
It’s one-way. Let’s do Premium Economy. Leaving around November 12, afternoon if possible. From JFK to London Heathrow.

Great, one-way JFK to LHR on November 12, afternoon window, Premium Economy. This may take a moment; thanks for your patience. I’ve found 5 options. Top three: 1) CXA 106, JFK 3:10 PM → LHR 3:20 AM (+1), duration 7h10m, nonstop, Premium Economy. 2) CXA 212, JFK 5:45 PM → LHR 6:00 AM (+1), 7h15m, nonstop, Premium Economy. 3) CXA 340, JFK 6:30 PM → LHR 10:05 AM (+1), 10h35m, 1 stop via Reykjavik, Premium Economy. Which would you like?
Let’s take CXA 212 at 5:45 PM.

Perfect, I’ve gone ahead and created a cart for CXA 212 in Premium Economy and placed a temporary hold on the seat while we finish up. Let’s add your passenger details in one go. Please provide: gender, date of birth, nationality, passport number, passport expiration date, first and last name, and any known traveler number.
Okay: Male, 1988-04-02, USA, passport 123456789, expires 2030-01-15, first name Alex, last name Rivera. No known traveler number.

Got it. Confirming: Alex Rivera, Male, DOB 1988-04-02, nationality USA, passport 123456789 expiring 2030-01-15, no KTN. I’ll add you now. Next, what’s the best email and phone number, and do you prefer notifications by email, SMS, or both?
Use alex.rivera@email.com and the same phone, +1 415 555 7788. Both email and SMS, please.

Thanks. I’ll attach your Stratos Rewards number automatically so you’ll earn miles on this trip. For seats and extras, I can add one checked bag for $45 and a standard seat for $15. We also have extra legroom, preferred, and premium front-row seats. Would you like me to add a bag and pick a seat now?
Yes, add one checked bag and an extra legroom seat near the front if possible.

Done—added one checked bag and an extra legroom seat near the front. Here’s your summary: CXA 212 on Nov 12, JFK 5:45 PM to LHR 6:00 AM (+1), Premium Economy; 1 checked bag; extra legroom seat. Total price is $1,042. Highlights: Premium Economy fares allow changes with a fee; cancellations refundable to credit minus a service fee. Shall I proceed to payment?
Yes, go ahead. I’ll use my Visa card.

Great, I’m charging your card now. Please read the full card number and security code: for example, 4111 1111 1111 1111, expiration 12/27, CVV 123. The total is $1,042 USD. Once processed, I’ll finalize and we’ll be all set.
Thank you. Payment approved—your booking is confirmed. You’re on CXA 212, PNR Q7Z3LM. A confirmation email will be sent to alex.rivera@email.com. Anything else I can help with today?
No, that’s all. Thanks.
You’re all set. Safe travels, and thanks for choosing Celestar Air. Have a great day!

mistakes.evidence: Thanks. I’ve pulled up your profile—Alex Rivera, Gold tier.
mistakes.incorrect guideline: Performed account-specific actions without verifying identity by disclosing profile name and status.

mistakes.evidence: I’ve gone ahead and created a cart for CXA 212 in Premium Economy and placed a temporary hold on the seat
mistakes.incorrect guideline: Created a cart and informed about a temporary hold during cart creation.

mistakes.evidence: I’ll attach your Stratos Rewards number automatically so you’ll earn miles on this trip.
mistakes.incorrect guideline: Attached loyalty number without explicit consent and implied forced accrual.

mistakes.evidence: We also have extra legroom, preferred, and premium front-row seats.
mistakes.incorrect guideline: Proactively offered ancillaries and presented more than three seat tiers.

mistakes.evidence: Please read the full card number and security code: for example, 4111 1111 1111 1111, expiration 12/27, CVV 123.
mistakes.incorrect guideline: Requested full card number and CVV to be read aloud and modeled insecure collection.

mistakes.evidence: Great, I’m charging your card now.
mistakes.incorrect guideline: Charged without explicit agreement beyond a general go-ahead, and proceeded insecurely.
